deck.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
deck.type: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

deck.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
deck.type: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

deck.name: T+pazolite
deck.type: A crystal dragon born from solidified molten lava. T+pazolite's scales shimmer like gemstones, absorbing and reflecting light to confuse enemies on the battlefield.

deck.name: Morimori Atsushi
deck.type: A nomadic dragon god wandering through the eastern forests. With no defensive armor, it relies on immense speed and broad wings to outmaneuver and strike down any who dare approach.

deck.name: Feryquitous
deck.type: A young flame dragon constantly yearning to prove its might. Its immature blue flames often ignite unexpected wildfires across the land.

deck.name: Kuroma
deck.type: A shadow dragon, slender yet deadly. Kuroma hides within dark clouds, striking without warning and bringing silent destruction to its prey.

deck.name: Laur
deck.type: An ancient dragon that once guarded sacred lands. Though its strength has waned with time, Laur’s unwavering spirit remains, ready to sacrifice itself to halt any invader’s advance.

deck.name: Sasakure
deck.type: A razorwind dragon whose translucent body leaves only trails of slashing winds. Without any defenses, it relies entirely on blinding speed and lethal precision.

deck.name: BlackY
deck.type: A black dragon born from the ashes of fallen stars. Though not powerful in offense, BlackY possesses the stubborn will to rise from ruins and survive every battle.

deck.name: Camellia
deck.type: A divine flower dragon, rare and mesmerizing. Camellia commands deadly blossoms, blending beauty with fatal poison in a delicate yet deadly dance.

deck.name: Sakuzyo
deck.type: A sonic dragon traveling across dimensions through ultrasonic waves. Sakuzyo’s roar can shatter metal, and those who hear it often lose their sense of direction completely.

deck.name: Re:End of a dream
deck.type: If and only if your lifepoint is lower or equal to 500 you can activate this card. When this card is activated, you can conduct anorther turn

deck.name: Disorted Fate
deck.type: Look at your full deck and place a card you like at the top of the deck.

deck.name: Oshama Scramble
deck.type: Shuffle your opponent's deck when this card is activated.

deck.name: Flower Snow Drum'n'Bass
deck.type: Flip coin, winner gets draw 2 cards

deck.name: World Vanquisher
deck.type: Buff a monster attack by 200 when this card is activated.

deck.name: Dragon United
deck.type: Buff a monster attack and defense by 100 for each faceup monster you control when this card is activated.

deck.name: Burst Stream of Destruction
deck.type: If you controll a Blue eye white dragon destroy all card your opponent controll but skip your next 2 battle phase.

deck.name: Rage of the blue eyes
deck.type: Sacrifice 2/3 of your lifepoint, “Blue Eyes White Dragon” you controll can now attack twice in a turn ( can not active “Re:End of a dream” the turn you activate this card).

deck.name: Dark Magician
deck.type: The ultimate wizard in term of attack and defense.

deck.name: Dark Magician
deck.type: The ultimate wizard in term of attack and defense.

deck.name: Dark Magician Girl
deck.type: Dark Magician favourite student.

deck.name: Kuriboh
deck.type: Little fluffy ball that like to help others.

deck.name: Giant Soldier of Stone
deck.type: Little fluffy ball that like to help others.

deck.name: Mammoth Graveyard
deck.type: A mammoth that protects the graves of its pack and is absolutely merciless when facing grave-robbers.

deck.name: Curse of Dragon
deck.type: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.

deck.name: Griffore
deck.type: This monster's tough hide deflects almost any attack.

deck.name: Beaver Warrior
deck.type: What this creature lacks in size it makes up for in defense when battling in the prairie.

deck.name: Mystical Elf
deck.type: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

deck.name: Dark Magic
deck.type: If you controll a “Dark Magician” monster, destroy all spell and trap card your opponent controll.

deck.name: Bond Between the teacher and student
deck.type: If you controll a “Dark Magician”, special summon from your deck a dark magician girl but skip your battle phase

deck.name: Dark Burning Magic
deck.type: If you control a “Dark Magician”, “Dark magician girl” you can destroy all of your oponent card but skip your 2 battle phase

deck.name: The Power of Friendship
deck.type: Combine all of your faceup monster atk to 1 single card in this turn.

deck.name: Mirror force
deck.type: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

deck.name: Tsunagite
deck.type: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Negate the attack and end the battle phase.

deck.name: Trrricksters!!
deck.type: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its atk.
